bibl.title: κινητιᾶν / βινητιᾶν in P. Köln 203 A 14.
bibl.note: Replies to: R. NÜNLIST, P. Mich. inv. 6950 (unpubliziert), P. Köln 203 und 243: Szenen aus Menanders Dis Exapaton?, ZPE 99 (1993) p. 262. - The verb β]ινητιᾶν (or as the case may be κινητιᾶν) bearing an active meaning in P. Köln V, 203 A, 14 remains unique. The trimeter proverb οὐδεὶς κομήτης ὅστις οὐ βινητιᾶι clearly refers to pueri capillati who are pathic homosexuals.
bibl.seg: BAIN David, κινητιᾶν / βινητιᾶν in P. Köln 203 A 14.

Replies to: R. NÜNLIST, P. Mich. inv. 6950 (unpubliziert), P. The trimeter proverb οὐδεὶς κομήτης ὅστις οὐ βινητιᾶι clearly refers to pueri capillati who are pathic homosexuals.
